subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: In a not-so-stunning development, the Mets lost another player and another game, when Fernando Nieve strained his right quadriceps in a 7-1 loss to the Braves.
snippet: In a not-so-stunning development, the Mets lost another player and another game, when Fernando Nieve strained his right quadriceps in a 7-1 loss to the Braves.
